name: ltaddrpd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))

comment: Adding a positive number to another number increases it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
